```{r setup, include=TRUE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(leaflet)
library(bcmaps)

air_zones <- bcmaps::get_layer('airzones', class = c('sf'))

m = leaflet() %>% addTiles()


# set bounds for BC
m = m %>% fitBounds(-139.06, 48.30, -114.03, 60.0)


# popup
m = m %>% addPopups(-93.65, 42.0285, 'Here is the <b>Department of Statistics</b>, ISU')
rand_lng = function(n = 10) rnorm(n, -93.65, .01)
rand_lat = function(n = 10) rnorm(n, 42.0285, .01)

# use automatic bounds derived from lng/lat data
m = m %>% clearBounds()

# popup
m %>% addPopups(rand_lng(), rand_lat(), 'Random popups')

```
